text: The UK ’ s Metropolitan police are investigating three more claims of sexual assault made against Kevin Spacey, Deadline has confirmed, bringing to six the number of allegations against Spacey being probed in London. According to TMZ, which first broke the news today, three men came forward earlier this year with three separate allegations — one stemming from an incident in Westminster in 1996 ; another in 2008 in Lambeth, the home of the Old Vic Theatre where Spacey was artistic director for 11 years ; and a third in Gloucester in 2013. In November, Scotland Yard opened an investigation into allegations that Spacey sexually assaulted a man in London in 2008.
